languages.text: {n}Маражай не скрывает презрения во взгляде, обращенном на дознавателя.{/n} "Тебе следовало сразу же убить обожженного мон-кай, а не идти на поводу своей веры в его силы и стойкость. Вы, мон-кай, и понятия не имеете об искусстве шпионства и измены. Я мог бы научить тебя хотя бы чему-то... если ты попросишь меня как следует". {n}Друкари обращает взгляд к вам.{/n} "Я здесь закончил. Идем".

{n}Marazhai does not hide the contempt in his look aimed at the Interrogator.{/n} "You should have killed the burnt mon-keigh immediately and not deluded yourself by putting faith in his strength and resilience. You mon-keigh are clueless when it comes to the art of espionage and treason. I could teach you a thing or two... If you ask nicely enough." {n}He turns his gaze toward you.{/n} "I am finished here. We may go."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай не скрывает презрения во взгляде, обращенном на дознавателя.{/n} "Тебе следовало сразу же убить обожженного мон-кай, а не идти на поводу своей веры в его силы и стойкость. Вы, мон-кай, и понятия не имеете об искусстве шпионства и измены. Я мог бы научить тебя хотя бы чему-то... если ты попросишь меня как следует". {n}Друкари обращает взгляд к вам.{/n} "Я здесь закончил. Идем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai does not hide the contempt in the look aimed at the Interrogator.{/n} "You should have killed the burned mon-keigh immediately and not delude yourself by putting faith in his strength and resilience. You mon-keigh have no understanding when it comes to the art of espionage and treason. I could teach you at least something... If you ask nicely enough." {n}He turns his gaze toward you.{/n} "I am done here. We may go."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ne cherche pas à dissimuler son dédain tandis qu'il observe l'interrogateur.{/n} « Vous auriez dû tuer immédiatement le mon-keigh brûlé, au lieu de vous voiler la face et de miser sur sa force et sa ténacité. Vous autres mon-keigh n'y connaissez vraiment rien en matière d'espionnage et de trahison. Je pourrais vous enseigner au moins une chose ou deux... Si vous le demandez gentiment. » {n}Il se tourne vers vous.{/n} « J'en ai terminé. Nous pouvons y aller. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not hide the contempt in his look aimed at the Interrogator.{/n} "You should have killed the burnt mon-keigh immediately and not deluded yourself by putting faith in his strength and resilience. You mon-keigh are clueless when it comes to the art of espionage and treason. I could teach you a thing or two... If you ask nicely enough." {n}He turns his gaze toward you.{/n} "I am finished here. We may go."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ne cherche pas à dissimuler son dédain tandis qu'il observe l'interrogateur.{/n} « Vous auriez dû tuer immédiatement le mon-keigh brûlé, au lieu de vous voiler la face et miser sur sa force et sa ténacité. Vous autres mon-keigh n'y connaissez vraiment rien en matière d'espionnage et de trahison. Je pourrais vous enseigner au moins une chose... Si vous le demandez gentiment. » {n}Il se tourne vers vous.{/n} « J'en ai terminé. Nous pouvons y aller. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看着海因里希，目光中的蔑视之意溢于言表。{/n}“你当初本该立刻杀了那个被烧坏了脸的猴子，不该欺骗自己，假装相信他的韧性与意志。若是谈及渗透与策反的艺术，你们这些猴子简直是一窍不通。说不定我可以教你些东西……如果你好好求我的话。”{n}他将目光转向了你。{/n}“我该做的事情已经做完了，可以走了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not hide the contempt in his look aimed at the Interrogator.{/n} "You should have killed the burnt mon-keigh immediately and not deluded yourself by putting faith in his strength and resilience. You mon-keigh are clueless when it comes to the art of espionage and treason. I could teach you a thing or two... If you ask nicely enough." {n}He turns his gaze toward you.{/n} "I am finished here. We may go."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看着海因里希，目光中的蔑视之意溢于言表。{/n}“你当初本该立刻杀了那个被烧坏了脸的猴子，不该欺骗自己，假装相信他的韧性与意志。若是谈及渗透与策反的艺术，你们这些猴子简直是一窍不通。说不定我可以教你些东西……如果你好好求我的话。”{n}他将目光转向了你。{/n}“我该做的事情已经做完了，我们可以走了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはインテロゲイターへの視線に軽蔑の色を隠さなかった。{/n}「お前は焼かれたモン＝ケイを即座に殺すべきだった。奴の強さと回復力を信じるなどと自分に言い聞かせずにな。お前たちモン＝ケイはスパイと反逆の心得に関しては無知だ。せめて1つや2つぐらい教えてやってもいいぞ…上手にお願いすればな」{n}彼はあなたに視線を向けた。{/n}「ここでの仕事は終わりだ。行くぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not hide the contempt in his look aimed at the Interrogator.{/n} "You should have killed the burnt mon-keigh immediately and not deluded yourself by putting faith in his strength and resilience. You mon-keigh are clueless when it comes to the art of espionage and treason. I could teach you a thing or two... If you ask nicely enough." {n}He turns his gaze toward you.{/n} "I am finished here. We may go."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはインテロゲイターへの視線に軽蔑の色を隠さなかった。{/n}「お前は焼かれたモン＝ケイを即座に殺すべきだった。奴の強さと回復力を信じるなどと自分に言い聞かせずにな。お前たちモン＝ケイはスパイと反逆の心得に関しては無知だ。せめて1つや2つぐらい教えてやってもいいぞ…上手にお願いすればな」{n}彼はあなたに視線を向けた。{/n}「ここでの仕事は終わりだ。行くぞ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai spart nicht mit Verachtung, als er den Interrogator anblickt.{/n} "Ihr hättet den verbrannten Chem-Pan-Sey sofort töten sollen, aber Ihr ließt Euch täuschen, indem Ihr auf seine Stärke und Hartnäckigkeit vertraut habt. Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey habt kein Verständnis von der Kunst der Spionage und des Verrats. Ich könnte Euch etwas darüber beibringen ... Wenn Ihr mich ganz lieb darum bittet." {n}Sein Blick wandert zu dir.{/n} "Ich bin hier fertig. Wir können gehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not hide the contempt in his look aimed at the Interrogator.{/n} "You should have killed the burnt mon-keigh immediately and not deluded yourself by putting faith in his strength and resilience. You mon-keigh are clueless when it comes to the art of espionage and treason. I could teach you a thing or two... If you ask nicely enough." {n}He turns his gaze toward you.{/n} "I am finished here. We may go."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai spart nicht mit Verachtung, als er den Interrogator anblickt.{/n} "Ihr hättet den verbrannten Chem-Pan-Sey sofort töten sollen, aber Ihr ließt Euch täuschen, indem Ihr auf seine Stärke und Hartnäckigkeit vertraut habt. Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey habt kein Verständnis von der Kunst der Spionage und des Verrats. Ich könnte Euch etwas darüber beibringen ... Wenn Ihr mich ganz lieb darum bittet." {n}Sein Blick wandert zu dir.{/n} "Ich bin fertig hier. Wir können gehen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai no oculta su desprecio en la mirada que echa al interrogador.{/n} «Deberías haber matado en el acto al mon-keigh quemado en vez de depositar tu confianza en su fuerza y resistencia. Los mon-keigh no tenéis la más mínima noción del arte del espionaje y la traición. Yo podría enseñarte un par de cosas... si me lo pides amablemente». {n}Desvía la mirada hacia ti.{/n} «Ya he terminado. Podemos irnos».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not hide the contempt in his look aimed at the Interrogator.{/n} "You should have killed the burnt mon-keigh immediately and not deluded yourself by putting faith in his strength and resilience. You mon-keigh are clueless when it comes to the art of espionage and treason. I could teach you a thing or two... If you ask nicely enough." {n}He turns his gaze toward you.{/n} "I am finished here. We may go."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai no oculta su desprecio en la mirada que echa al interrogador.{/n} «Deberías haber matado en el acto al mon-keigh quemado en vez de depositar tu confianza en su fuerza y resistencia. Los mon-keigh no tenéis la más mínima noción del arte del espionaje y la traición. Yo podría enseñarte algo... si me lo pides amablemente». {n}Desvía la mirada hacia ti.{/n} «Ya he terminado. Podemos irnos».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, Sorgucu'ya bakarken duyduğu nefreti saklamıyor.{/n} "O yanmış mon-keigh'i hemen öldürmeliydin. Güçlü kuvvetli olduğuna inanarak kendi kendini kandırmamalıydın. Siz mon-keighler, casusluk ve ihanet işinden zerre anlamıyorsunuz. Yalvarırsan belki öğretebilirim." {n}Marazhai, bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Burada işim bitti. Gidelim."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not hide the contempt in his look aimed at the Interrogator.{/n} "You should have killed the burnt mon-keigh immediately and not deluded yourself by putting faith in his strength and resilience. You mon-keigh are clueless when it comes to the art of espionage and treason. I could teach you a thing or two... If you ask nicely enough." {n}He turns his gaze toward you.{/n} "I am finished here. We may go."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, Sorgucu'ya bakarken duyduğu nefreti saklamıyor bile.{/n} "O yanmış mon-keighi hemen öldürmeliydin. Güçlü kuvvetli olduğuna inanarak kendi kendini kandırmamalıydın. Siz mon-keighler casusluk ve ihanet işinden asla anlamıyorsunuz. Öğretmem için yalvarırsan öğretirim belki." {n}Marazhai bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Burada işim bitti. Gidelim."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
